summary: Custom weapons sold by Belethor of Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
It\'s been four months since I last downloaded Chachanshen\'s work from the Nexus. It was removed due to copyright hits and he was consequently banned. I really loved his works so I asked his permission to re-upload his works without those copyright hits. 

So here is his mod again. I have removed other items in it that uses external assets to obey the Terms of User Agreement. The mythic weapons and their archematics were also removed. I\'m sorry to those who loved using these cool weapons.

There may still be items that use external assets but with explicit permissions from their respective authors and the credits are given through their unique names in-game. I do not know which are specific to this so feel free to inform me. 

If you have questions regarding the original full version of this mod feel free to ask me. 

INSTALLATION

After downloading this mod, extract the file at your desktop. 
You should have a DATA folder. This folder should contain three items: 

MESHES folder
TEXTURES folder
ESP file

Select the three files. Copy the three files.

Go to the DATA folder of your Skyrim directory. Paste the three items you just copied. It should prompt you to overwrite MESHES and TEXTURES folder. If there is no overwrite prompt then you are doing it wrong. 

Check mod at the DATA FILES.

Visit Belethor\'s General Goods at Whiterun. Check also the forge for the mod arrows.
author: Rudolflee
